details.message:
`001.007.004 Mk_Workflow_Triggers`
- Test creates the following 4 workflow form triggers.
- "Send Alert".
- "Create Follow-up Work".
- "Add New Work Stage".
- "Create Event Reading".
- To test triggers, see `004.002.001`.
